author: SportsManias
title: SportsManias Helps Diehards Dominate Fantasy Football With
text:
MIAMI , Sept. 10,    SportsManias , the real-time news team source for diehards, today released its brand new feature for fantasy football players ready to dominate the 2015 NFL Season. The SportsManias app's new feature brings fantasy fanatics their own personalized team news feeds with real-time updates that will provide a major competitive edge. The fantasy football feature allows users to simply import their rosters from services like ESPN Fantasy Football, Yahoo! Sports Fantasy Football, and CBSSports.com Fantasy Football. The app then curates a personalized fantasy news feed that delivers real-time updates from sports journalists and fantasy football experts on their players.
Just like SportsManias' flagship team-specific feeds, the fantasy edition pulls in news stories, Tweets, video content and other information about individual players. This turns the SportsManias platform into the fantasy competitor's ultimate weapon. 
The SportsManias app delivers optional notifications about breaking news, scoring opportunities, fantasy points and milestones. For fantasy competitors who want to know when their running back is in the red zone or eclipses 100 yards rushing, SportsManias doesn't miss a beat.  
"This personalized fantasy feed will be a game-changer for the fantasy player. Fantasy football is a giant business with legions of dedicated fans that rely on technology and information to gain an edge over their opponents," said Vicente Fernandez , co-founder at SportsManias. "If you're a fantasy fanatic, you know how stressful it is to scour sports websites five minutes before kickoff to find out if your star, listed as a 'Game-Time Decision', is active or needs a replacement. Now, you can get all the fantasy news you need through our platform â€“ it is the ultimate tool for making your lineup decisions and dominating the league."
The free SportsManias fantasy news app is available on both Android and iOS devices. 
About SportsManias 
SportsManias is the real-time team news source for the avid sports fan. The web and mobile platform curates all of the best sports content on Twitter into customized, real-time feeds for the diehard. Featuring team feeds for every NFL, NCAA, MLB, NBA, NHL, MLS and international soccer team, SportsManias delivers top sports journalism personalized to the fan's interest. It gives fans the news they want, how they want it, when they want it, eliminating their search for team-specific news. A new fantasy feature provides diehards personalized feeds on all of their fantasy players, delivered by fantasy football experts. Straight from the guys who get it, SportsManias gets it to you. Visit SportsManias.com and download the free five-star rated app. @sportsmanias
